author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OUTER BANDS BEGINNING TO AFFECT THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA...
summary: ...OUTER BANDS BEGINNING TO AFFECT THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA... As of 5:00 AM MST Tue Oct 07 the center of Priscilla was located near 19.6, -109.6 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 967 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...OUTER BANDS BEGINNING TO AFFECT THE SOUTHERN BAJA CALIFORNIA PENINSULA... As of 5:00 AM MST Tue Oct 07 the center of Priscilla was located near 19.6, -109.6 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 967 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
